The '''Minecraft Creator-Safe Playlist''' is a playlist that includes music from various ''[[Minecraft]]'' games and official collaborations. This playlist is designed for creators to use in their content (commercial and non-commercial) provided it abides by the '''Minecraft Usage Guidelines''', as using the music will not violate copyright protections.<ref>{{link|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/can-i-use-minecraft-music-|title=Can I use Minecraft Music?|date=June 12, 2023}}</ref>

== Official description ==
''This playlist is a collection of tracks that you're welcome to use in the Minecraft content that you create. For more information, please check out the "Can I use Minecraft music?" article on [https://Help.minecraft.net help.minecraft.net.]''

== Contents ==
This playlist contains all musics and official remixes from ''[[Minecraft]]'', including ''[[Minecraft: Battle & Tumble (Original Soundtrack)|Battle and Tumble]]'', ''Glide Mini Game'', and official Marketplace content music, except [[Grid Runners]], all musics and remixes from ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]'', and the multiple DLC, all musics and remixes from ''[[Minecraft Legends]]'', the music from ''[[Minecraft Earth]]'', all the ''[[Minecraft: Soothing Scenes]]'', all the music used for ''[[Minecraft Live]]'', [[Minecraft: Shape Your World]], and the soundtrack for ''Caller's Bane''.
